tool.name: pRESTO BuildConsensus
tool.description: Builds a consensus sequence for each set of input sequences
tool.command:
ln -s '$fastq_in' in.fastq && BuildConsensus.py --nproc "\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1}" -s in.fastq -n '$n' --bf '$bf' -q '$q' --freq '$freq' #if $maxgap --maxgap '$maxgap' #end if #if $pf --pf '$pf' #end if #if $prcons --prcons '$prcons' #end if #if $cf --cf $cf #end if #if $act --act $act #end if $dep
#if $filtering.filter == "diversity" --maxdiv '$filtering.maxdiv' #end if #if $filtering.filter == "error" --maxerror '$filtering.maxerror' #end if
--outname=tmp #if $capture_log --log '$log_out' #end if

param.name: fastq_in
param.label: Input FASTQ file
param.help: FASTQ file of sequences with barcodes/UMIs in an annotation.

param.label: Min Count
param.help: Minimum number of squences to form a valid consensus.

param.label: Barcode Field
param.help: Name of the annotation field which contains the barcode/UMI sequence.

param.label: Min Quality
param.help: Minimum quality under which an ambiguous character is assigned to a consensus base.

param.label: Min Frequency
param.help: At a given position the fraction of basecalls required to agree to output an unambiguous base.

param.label: Max Gap Fraction
param.help: Positions with greater than this fraction of gaps are deleted from the consensus.

param.label: Primer Field
param.help: Name of the annotation field which contains the primer sequence (often PRIMER).

param.label: Primer Consensus Frequency
param.help: Specify to define a minimum primer frequency required to assign a consensus primer, and filter out sequences with minority primers from the consensus building step.

param.label: Copy Fields
param.help: Zero or more space-separated annotations to copy from input sequences to consensus sequences.

param.label: Copy Actions
param.help: Space-separated list of actions to take on copied annotations. Must be of same length as Copy Fields. Options are: min,max,sum,set,majority.

param.label: Dependent Model
param.help: Specify to calculate consensus quality with a non-independence assumption.

param.name: filter
param.label: Filtering Strategy
param.option: Filter by diversity (average pairwise error rate of input reads).
Filters by error rate of input reads vs. consensus.

param.label: Max Diversity
param.help: Remove consensus reads with average pairwise error between input reads above this cutoff [0-1].

param.label: Max Error
param.help: Remove consensus reads with average error vs. input reads above this cutoff [0-1].
